questions: Can you provide details about your educational background and any relevant certifications in Information Technology?
How did you develop your proficiency in Python, Java, and AWS without any professional experience?
Have you worked on any personal projects or contributed to open-source projects to showcase your skills in Information Technology?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in the IT industry, especially in relation to Python, Java, and AWS?
Can you discuss a challenging problem you have encountered while working with Python, Java, or AWS, and how you successfully resolved it?
How do you approach learning new technologies or programming languages, and how quickly can you adapt to them?
Have you had any experience collaborating with a team on IT projects, and if so, how did you contribute to the team's success?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively when working on multiple projects simultaneously?
Can you provide an example of a successful implementation of Python, Java, or AWS in a project you have worked on, and the impact it had on the project's outcome?
How do you plan to gain practical experience in Information Technology to complement your theoretical knowledge and skills in Python, Java, and AWS?
